ADD_LIBRARY(phigs
     ut.c ut_mat.c ut_list.c ut_htab.c ut_nset.c ut_stk.c ut_conv.c
     css_ini.c css_stb.c css_set.c css_str.c css_el.c css_inq.c css_pr.c
     css_ws.c phg.c phg_str.c phg_el.c phg_attr.c phg_ws.c phg_hdl.c phg_psl.c
     phg_err.c phg_errnum.c phg_col.c phg_inq.c phg_tr.c phg_inp.c phg_wst.c
     phg_ut.c wsb.c wsb_lut.c ws_inp.c wsgl.c wsgl_attr.c wsgl_draw.c
     wsgl_hatch.c wsgl_light.c wsx.c wsx_util.c wstx_ini.c wsx_inp.c sin.c
     sinq.c sin_evt.c sin_ws.c sin_cvs.c sin_val.c sin_cho.c sin_str.c
     sin_dev.c phg_mroman.c phg_roman.c ar.c ar_conv.c ar_ops.c
     wsgl_extfill.c
    )
